aka: Everything About Martin Suter. Everything but the Truth.
this_title: Alles über Martin Suter. Ausser die Wahrheit.
trans_title: 关于马丁·苏特的所有真相
Everything About Martin Suter. Everything but the Truth.
introduction: His theme is the criminal potential of our society, his heroes oscillate between business class and hopelessness. The film accompanies the Swiss bestselling author Martin Suter through his literary and private cosmos. Blurring the boundaries between fiction and documentary, the film allows Martin Suter to immerse himself in his own literary world.
chinese_title: 关于马丁·苏特的所有真相
foreign_title: Alles über Martin Suter. Ausser die Wahrheit.
